q: GM North America President Mark Reuss and Chrysler's Sergio Marchionne all promise not to fall back into the trap of making too many cars and then slapping huge discounts on the vehicles to move metal off dealer lots. This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit, said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat. Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to deal with the current reality.
